alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 6:28PM CDT until June 18 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL KERR AND SOUTHWESTERN GILLESPIE COUNTIES... At 628 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hunt, or 13 miles west of Kerrville, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ingram, Hunt, Mountain Home, Waltonia, Kerr Wildlife Management Area and Harper. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
